description: This cute fairy design will put a smile on everyone as they think of the “Happiest Place on Earth”. The perfect unique gift for her on any occasion such as a birthday, Mother’s Day, Valentine’s Day, Christmas, Wedding, Anniversary or even a Housewarming or Bachelorette Party. Each wine glass is made using high quality, durable glass for long-lasting, brilliant clarity. The design is not a sticker, ink or paint. It is permanent engraving that is 100% dishwasher safe and will never fade or wash off. Your glass will come in a ready to wrap gift box making this present not only perfect for them, but easy for you! 100% Money Back Guarantee!
